skillTree.name: Sneaky
skillTree.description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!

skillTree.name: Tricksy
skillTree.description: All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Dance of Death
skillTree.description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.

skillTree.name: Gutter Fighter
skillTree.description: This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!

skillTree.name: Elusive
skillTree.description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"

skillTree.name: Precise
skillTree.description: Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!

skillTree.name: Survivalist
skillTree.description: "The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud - these are the things that sustain me."

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Opportunist
skillTree.description: Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…

skillTree.name: Counter-Striker
skillTree.description: The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.

skillTree.name: Bloody Blade
skillTree.description: A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Blur of Motion
skillTree.description: Only the best-greatest warriors can learn these techniques.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for melee infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Spotting
skillTree.description: I tell you where to shoot-throw, you do as I say, yes!

effects.description:
Missile strength: +2% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +4% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Night Runners and Gutter Runners units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Stolen Supplies
skillTree.description: From last job with man-things. Won't miss them.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +2% to Night Runners and Gutter Runner units
	(Hero's army)

Ammunition: +4% to Night Runners and Gutter Runner units
	(Hero's army)

Ammunition: +8% to Night Runners and Gutter Runner units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Master-Instructor
skillTree.description: Learned in the far-east. Watch, and do as I do!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +2% for Death Runners and Eshin Triads units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +4% for Death Runners and Eshin Triads units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Death Runners and Eshin Triads units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Infamous
skillTree.description: Honored by Lord Sneek, yes-yes!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 for Death Runners and Eshin Triads units
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +3 for Death Runners and Eshin Triads units
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +5 for Death Runners and Eshin Triads units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Distractions
skillTree.description: I distract, you stab-strike.

effects.description: Enable contact effect: "Overhelm" that greatly lowers melee damage and reload time reduction

skillTree.name: New Orders
skillTree.description: Council of Thirteen directs me-me.

skillTree.name: Veiled in Shadow
skillTree.description: Can't hit what you can't see-see.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +6% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Concealed Weapons
skillTree.description: Always another blade.

skillTree.name: Impatient
skillTree.description: We keep moving! Eat those that can't keep up.

skillTree.name: Ka-Rat'e
skillTree.description: A rat that lives close to the flame leads a short life.

skillTree.name: Heads on Spikes
skillTree.description: A nice warning-threat, to keep away the fools-fools. Of course, will need more heads to make more.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%
	(Heroes in local region)

skillTree.name: Hidden Paths
skillTree.description: There is always another way.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Disciple
skillTree.description: Useful, if a bit impetuous.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +6% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Notorious
skillTree.description: It’s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.

skillTree.name: Contacts
skillTree.description: Sometimes it’s best to have friends in low places.

skillTree.name: Shadow
skillTree.description: Always watching.

skillTree.name: Grandmaster
skillTree.description: They’ve all heard the stories of this one’s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 7%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 12%

skillTree.name: Spread Public Order
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 1
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 2
Spread Public Order action: Public order is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 20% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 2% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Sharp Claws
backgroundSkills.description: "I keep them sharp, yes-yes. Always ready for the challenge that I know is coming, yes-yes!"

backgroundSkills.name: Sharp Teeth
backgroundSkills.description: "When they come for you, go straight for the throat and tear it clean out. They won't come again."

backgroundSkills.name: Warpstone Hoarder
backgroundSkills.description: "Most precious of all substances, the pulse of our life."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Warpfire Thrower, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Warp Armour
backgroundSkills.description: Slow but good to get some nasty hits.
